# Government Tender Announcement
### Roofing Repairs at 14 Wing Greenwood
#### Solicitation # WS4128852079

**Tender Details**

* **Bid Period End Date:** 2023-08-30
* **Solicitation Type:** Request for Standing Offer (RFSA)
* **Procurement Category:** Services (SRV)

**Tender Description**

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contractor to provide roofing repairs and replacements at 14 Wing Greenwood and remote sites. The contract duration is two years with three optional one-year periods. 

**Submission Requirements**

Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful. Reference the solicitation for further details.

**Security Requirements**

Please refer to the solicitation for further details on security requirements.

**Solicitation Documentation**

For full solicitation documentation, please visit: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17068247](http://http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17068247)

**Contracting Entity**

* **Name:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address:** 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

**End User Entity**

* **Name:** Department of National Defence (DND)
* **Address:** 101 Colonel By Dr,Ottawa,Ontario,K1A0K2,Canada
